tool.name: Titration
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the CMIP titration module.

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the input PDB file. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: input_vdw_params_path
param.label: input TXT file
param.help: Path to the CMIP input Van der Waals force parameters, if not provided the CMIP conda installation one is used ("$CONDA_PREFIX/share/cmip/dat/vdwprm"). Format: [input].txt

param.name: input_params_path
param.label: input TXT file
param.help: Path to the CMIP input parameters file. Format: [input].txt

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the output PDB file Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: energy_cutoff
param.label: energy_cutoff
param.help: Energy cutoff, extremely hight value to enable the addition of all the ions and waters before reaching the cutoff.

param.name: num_wats
param.label: num_wats
param.help: Number of water molecules to be added.

param.name: neutral
param.label: neutral
param.help: Neutralize the charge of the system. If selected *num_positive_ions* and *num_negative_ions* values will not be taken into account.

param.name: num_positive_ions
param.label: num_positive_ions
param.help: Number of positive ions to be added (Tipatom IP=Na+).

param.name: num_negative_ions
param.label: num_negative_ions
param.help: Number of negative ions to be added (Tipatom IM=Cl-).

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the CMIP Titration executable binary.
